sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Building, Mail, Lock, Eye, EyeOff, User, BookOpen, MapPin, Phone } from 'lucide-react'; import BaseRegister from './BaseRegister'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; export default function InstituteRegister() { const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = React.useState(false); const [showConfirmPassword, setShowConfirmPassword] = React.useState(false); const initialFormData = { institutionName: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', contactPerson: '', phone: '', address: '', registrationNumber: '', agreeToTerms: false, role: 'institute' }; const { register } = useAuth(); const handleSubmit = async (formData: typeof initialFormData) => { if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) { return { success: false, message: 'Passwords do not match' }; } if (!formData.agreeToTerms) { return { success: false, message: 'Please agree to the terms and conditions' }; } const userData = { name: formData.institutionName, email: formData.email, password: formData.password, role: 'institute', contactPerson: formData.contactPerson, phone: formData.phone, address: formData.address, registrationNumber: formData.registrationNumber }; return await register(userData); }; return ( {({ formData, handleInputChange, isLoading }: any) => ( <>
